about_the_game:
Urban Gallery

This Urban-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of various urban lifestyle times, builders and iconography!

Explore what the big city has to offer!

Contents

The Urban gallery unlocks the following images:
  • City Scene
  • Cityline
  • Public Transport
  • Highways
  • Fire Hydrant
  • Phone Box
  • Nightlife
  • Taxi
  • Street Food
  • LA River
  • Suburbs
  • Amsterdam
  • Tagging
  • Postal Service
  • Traffic Lights
  • Northern Town
  • Underground
  • Tyne Bridge
  • Izakaya
  • Traffic
  • Venice

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Urban Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Urban-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of various urban lifestyle times, builders and iconography! Explore what the big city has to offer!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
